duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform various Selling / Customer Service activities to assist Boat and ATV Customers in making informed buying decisions.
Engage all customers entering the department in a friendly and timely manner.
Meet with potential customers to determine their boating and or ATV needs.
Provide information necessary to allow the customer to make an informed buying decision.
Maintain current product knowledge by using available resources, i.e., product brochures, Internet and product information training meetings.
Remain current on & adhere to all selling skills training & direction.
Work cooperatively with the Service Department to see that delivery to the customer is seamless.
Maintain complete confidentiality of all sensitive & personal information.
Prepare the showroom each morning to ensure proper signage is in place per established presentation standards and all products are clean, presentable and in sellable condition.
Generate and manage leads & prospects in provided Customer Relationship Management (CRM) tool on a daily basis.
Accurately complete all necessary paperwork required within the selling process.
Participate in special events such as Boat Shows, Parking Lot events, etc.
Maintain a clean and professional work area.
Follow all Company Policies and Procedures.
